commands.namereplace.add.success: Set name for %s to "%s". Clients may need to disconnect and reconnect before this name shows in the tablist.
commands.namereplace.remove.success: Removed custom name for %s. Clients may need to disconnect and reconnect before the name changes in the tablist.
commands.namereplace.clear.success: Cleared all replaced names. Clients may need to disconnect and reconnect before original names show in the tablist.
